title: Episode 80: Eric Bromber
description:
This week on Let’s Eat In restauranteur Eric Bromberg of the Blue Ribbon Restaurants sits down with Cathy to talk about what exactly it takes for a restaurant to last over a decade in New York as well as to talk about his latest venture: Blue Ribbon Sushi. Tune in find out why sometimes seafood may be the best date meal and more on Let’s Eat In.
This episode is sponsored by Fairway Market
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
